Description: Should be nicknamed 'Tornado Turnover'. How is this man paid nearly $20 million a year?
Promising rookie. Strong ability to drive to basket. Alpha mentality. Must work on jump shot.
Beast in the paint. Almost broke NBA FG% record. If Knicks trade him, I am done.
Has athletic potential. Beautiful jump shot. Instead, looks like a baby giraffe on the court.
First 2 years were garbage. Finally starting to show up in the 2019-20 season. Defensive god. Let's go Frankie smokes!
MONSTER. BUST. Should just use his outstanding athleticism for the high jump in Track and Field.
Great scoring off the bench. Almost picturesque 6th man. Just doesn't pass the ball much.
Excellent effort. Great 3-point shot. Not sure why he did not get more minutes this year.
Solid playmaking and ability to drive. Shooting is horrible and is a selfish stat padder.
Somewhat decent shooter. Really fell off this season in terms of consistency.
